p-0: Services we offer to Company clients are:
p-11: Added services that CCS can facilitate through our partners include:
p-12: White Papering and Smart Contracts to ensure the compliance of each token you release with us;
p-13: Blockchain Development to get you the proper technical support and resources to build your blockchain software;
p-14: Third party Due Dilligence of a professional blockchain legal team continually confirming the compliance of your contracts;
p-15: Financial Modeling adapting your use of available resources to current financial data;
p-16: Static Analysis derived from customized unit tests to monitor the cohesiveness and optimize the adaptibility of your operational model to the blockchain;
p-17: Signed Validation via GPG signed files for all contracts;
p-18: Dynamic Analysis providing a complete list of documentation detailing each function of the smart contract;
p-19: Vulnerability Testing which compares your data against vulnerable coding as it arises; and
